trans-unit.source: Selects the surrogate that can be used to serialize an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Velger erstatning som kan brukes til å serialisere en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A serialization surrogate gives you an object that can handle the serialization requirements of a different object and, if necessary, can transform the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]En erstatning for serialisering gir deg et objekt som kan håndtere serialisering kravene til et annet objekt, og om nødvendig kan gjøre den serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivitySurrogateSelector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivitySurrogateSelector"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivitySurrogateSelector"></xref> that can be used to serialize an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivitySurrogateSelector"> </xref> som kan brukes til å serialisere en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Finds the surrogate that represents the specified type, starting with the specified surrogate selector for the specified serialization context.
trans-unit.target: Finner erstatning som representerer med den angitte erstatning velgeren for den angitte serialisering konteksten den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: The type of surrogate returned is dependent upon what type is assignable from `type`.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags erstatning returnerte er avhengig av hvilken type kan tilordnes fra `type`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> for which to obtain a surrogate.
A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that serves as the source or destination context for the current serialization.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som fungerer som kilden eller målet konteksten for gjeldende serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"></xref> that holds a reference to the surrogate selector where the appropriate surrogate was found.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, inneholder en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISurrogateSelector"> </xref> som inneholder en referanse til erstatning velgeren der den riktige erstatning ble funnet.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate surrogate for the specified type and context.
trans-unit.target: Den riktige erstatning for den angitte typen og kontekst.

trans-unit.source: type contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: typeinneholder en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).
